lead_paragraph: Two-time Wimbledon tennis champion Petra Kvitova underwent nearly four hours of surgery on her playing hand on Tuesday after she was stabbed by a knife-wielding intruder in her home in the Czech Republic.

headline.print_headline: Kvitova Undergoes Hand Surgery Following Knife Attack, Full Recovery Expected
headline.main: Kvitova Undergoes Hand Surgery Following Knife Attack, Full Recovery Expected

snippet: Two-time Wimbledon tennis champion Petra Kvitova underwent nearly four hours of surgery on her playing hand on Tuesday after she was stabbed by a knife-wielding intruder in her home in the Czech Republic....
